summary: Command‑line utility that runs a frame‑level voice activity detection model on audio files listed in a manifest, splits long recordings into manageable chunks, converts frame predictions into speech segments, writes the results as RTTM files, and optionally evaluates detection quality using AUROC and DER metrics.
business_intent: Enable automated speech activity labeling for large audio collections, supporting downstream speech analytics, diarization, and model assessment within NeMo‑based ASR pipelines.
